articles.description: GARY LINEKER has reignited his row with Good Morning Britain host Richard Madeley after a fiery debate about an oil protest.

articles.author: Annabel Nugent
articles.title: Robert Eggers: ‘The Northman is the movie I’m proud of and the one I wanted to make’ - The Independent
articles.description: A Viking blockbuster is not what audiences have come to expect from the indie director of ‘The Witch’ and ‘The Lighthouse’. Eggers opens up to Annabel Nugent about his love of the past, how test screenings can be a ‘frustrating’ experience – and why, despite …
articles.content: Please dont watch The Northman on your phone. It would break Robert Eggers heart to see his Viking epic confined to a six-inch screen. The director, with his pale green eyes and all-black attire, loo… [+9738 chars]

articles.author: Bridie Pearson-jones
articles.title: Prince William signs up for a climate change podcast - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Duke of Cambridge, 39, was discussing The Earthshot Prize with the Australian actress as part of a new podcast Climate of Change.
articles.content:
Prince William has described himself as a 'stubborn optimist' and said 'huge strides' can be made in tackling the planet's environmental crisis in a new podcast with actress Cate Blanchett.

articles.title: Cuba Gooding Jr pleads guilty to forcibly touching a woman in New York club - The Guardian
articles.description: The Oscar-winning actor has been accused of violating three women but has pled guilty to just one allegation
articles.content:
Cuba Gooding Jr pleaded guilty on Wednesday to forcibly touching a woman at a New York nightclub in 2018.
